Mushrooming towards him. Steed can't escape it.  It envelops him.  Starts to blink.  Cough.  Footsteps less sure. Surrounded by thick purple haze Steed stumbles and falls Down a hill.  Tumbles to the bottom.  He knocks his head on a rock.  Steed blinks, shakes his head.  Eyes refocus.  He sees 77      UNDULATING SAND DUNES Sun shining down on yellow sand, a barren vista.  Dead trees.  Suddenly Steed's in the Sahara.  A heat haze shimmers. Steed blinks, thinks he's dreaming when he sees ... 78      IN DISTANCE - RED PHONE BOX Steed heads towards it.  The PHONE BOX seems further away.  Like an optical illusion.  Then hears RINGING. Steed still bowler-hatted.  Overcoat.  Perspiring.  Takes off bowler, wipes brow. Adjusts rose in buttonhole.
